name: Snmpstat/WEB Network monitoring system a
short_description: Snmpstat is SNMP based monitoring system, designed to monitor Routers, Switches, Firewalls and other network devices. CCR is cisco configuration repository which provides change control and automated downloading. Main users - ISP && data centers
